commit.message:
re PR c++/10047 (-fno-default-inline produces bogus warnings)

cp:
	PR c++/10047
	* decl2.c (finish_file): Don't warn about explicitly instantiated
	inline decls.
testsuite:
	PR c++/10047
	* g++.dg/template/inline1.C: New test.

From-SVN: r64953

files.patch:

+
+	PR c++/10047
+	* decl2.c (finish_file): Don't warn about explicitly instantiated
+	inline decls.
+
